name: IndependentHealth
0:
”Alexa, open Independent Health.”
”Alexa, ask Independent Health what is my deductible balance?”
”Alexa, ask Independent Health what is my copay for a hospital stay?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: independent health
Developer Terms of Use
des:
When you have questions about your Independent Health plan, ask Alexa - and get answers through the skill. It's another way we bring you the RedShirt treatment - wherever you need it. 

Depending on the type of plan you have, you can us ask about:

 • Your deductible 
 • Location of the nearest Urgent Care center
 • Your top benefits (e.g., your cost to visit an Emergency Room)
 • Your Health Extras debit card balance
 
Our skill requires you to link your Independent Health online member account for use. Apart from an Alexa-enabled device and a smartphone or computer to link your account, no additional hardware is required to use our skill.

Note that this tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
